site_name: Horsenden Primary School & Mandeville Special School
description: Details of Plan showing location of at least 7 disabled car parking spaces pursuant to condition 11 of planning permission P/2013/4808 dated: 20/12/13 for Internal and external alterations to existing building including the erection of a single storey lobby extension and enclosure of sprinkler tank and erection of part single and two storey building linked to the South side of Mandeville Special School to provide classrooms, hall and associated accommodation; erection of part single and two storey building for Horsenden Primary School in South part of site with covered walkways linking to existing school and Children's Centre; alterations to hard and soft landscaping, including the provision of new and revised play areas, multi-use games area, retaining walls, embankments and tree planting and alterations to minibus parking and manoeuvring area accessed off Burwell Avenue to provide an additional 10 minibus parking spaces.
